Title: Some Code Smells Have a Significant but Small Effect on Faults
Published: ACM Transactions on Software Engineering and Methodology (TOSEM)
Summary: They investigate the relationship between faults and five of Fowler et al.â€™s least-studied smells in code
Outcome:
results suggest that Switch Statements had no effect on faults in any of the three systems; Message Chains 
    increased faults in two systems; Message Chains which occurred in larger files reduced faults;
